**2025** \| **Scientific Communication** \| Comunidades bioinformáticas sin fronteras \| Biotecnología en Movimiento, Año 10. Número 40, cap 6 (31 marzo 2025) \| **Evelia Lorena Coss-Navarrete**, Erika Viridiana Cruz Bonilla y Nelly Sélem Mojica \| Link: **2024** \| **Scientific Abstracts** \|AB1113 ALLELE SPECIFIC GENE EXPRESSION DURING TOLERANCE INDUCTION ON DENDRITIC CELLS FROM MEXICAN WOMEN WITH SYSTEMIC LUPUS ERYTHEMATOSUS \| A. L. Hernández-Ledesma, S. Salazar-Magaña, **E. L. Coss-Navarrete**, K. J. Nuñez-Reza, L. Tinajero Nieto, A. Peña-Ayala, E. Torres-Valdez, G. Felix Rodríguez, G. Frontana-Vázquez, F. Rosetti, S. L. Fernández-Valverde, M. Gutierrez Arcelus, D. Alpizar-Rodriguez, A. Medina-Rivera \| **2023** \| **Scientific Communication** \| Los Neutrofilos, chile del que pica o chile del que no pica? \| El linfocito - Number 3 \| Karr de Leon S, **Coss-Navarrete EL**, Brunck ME \| Link: **2022** \| **Journal Article** \| Transcriptome-guided annotation and functional classification of long non-coding RNAs in *Arabidopsis thaliana* \| **Nature** *Scientific Reports* \| Corona-Gomez, J.A., **Coss-Navarrete, E.L.**, *et al.* **DOI:** \| PMID: 35982083 - Conducted transcriptome‑guided annotation and functional classification of long non‑coding RNAs in *Arabidopsis thaliana* - **Github:** [Transcriptome-guided_lncRNA_annotation](https://github.com/RegRNALab/Transcriptome-guided_lncRNA_annotation) - Performed transcriptome sequencing to identify long non‑coding RNAs related to seedling development in *Arabidopsis thaliana Col‑0* at 8 days under wild‑type conditions. **Bioproject:** [PRJNA765039](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/bioproject/PRJNA765039) **2022** \| **Educational** \| Plants & Python: A series of lessons in coding, plant biology, computation, and bioinformatics \| The Plant Cell, Volume 34, Issue 7, July 2022, Page e1 \| VanBuren R , Rougon-Cardoso A, Amezquita EJ, **Coss-Navarrete EL**, Espinosa-Jaime A, Gonzalez-Iturbe OA, Luckie-Duque AC, Mendoza-Galindo E, Pardo J, Rodriguez-Guerrero G, Rosiles-Loeza PY, Vasquez-Cruz M, Fernandez-Valverde SL, Hernandez-Hernandez T, Palande S, and Chitwood. DH. \| **DOI:** - Translation from Spanish to English, supporting bilingual accessibility of teaching materials. - Webpage: [Plants & Python](https://plantsandpython.github.io/PlantsAndPython/00_Opening_page.html) - GitHub: [[PlantsAndPython]{.underline}](https://github.com/PlantsAndPython/PlantsAndPython) **2020** \| **Book Chapter** \| Chapter 6 - Induction of plant resistance to biotic stress by priming with β-aminobutyric acid (BABA) and its effect on nitrogen-fixing nodule development \| **Evelia Lorena Coss-Navarrete**, Armando Díaz-Valle, Raúl Alvarez-Venegas \| **DOI:** - This chapter derived from my Master’s thesis. I carried out bean cultivation, biological analyses, nitrogen fixation measurements, and studied symbiosis and priming with *Rhizobium tropici* and BABA. **2018** \| **Journal Article** \| Down-regulation of PvTRX1h increases nodule number and affects auxin, starch, and metabolic fingerprints in the common bean (*Phaseolus vulgaris L.*) \| *Plant Science* \| Barraza A, **Coss-Navarrete EL**, Vizuet-de-Rueda JC, Martinez-Aguilar K, Hernandez-Chavez JL, Ordaz-Ortiz JJ, Winkler R, Tiessen A, Alvarez-Venegas R. D \| **DOI:** [https://doi.org/10.1038/s41598-022-18254-0](#0) \| PMID: 30080634 - This article derived from my Bachelor’s thesis. I supported bean cultivation and performed RT‑qPCR analyses to study gene expression related to nodule development and metabolic regulation. **2017** \| **Journal Article** \| Partial characterization of the proteolytic properties of an enzymatic extract from “Aguama” *Bromelia pinguin L.* fruit grown in Mexico \| Applied Biochemistry and Biotechnology \| Jesús Martín Moreno-Hernández, Xitlalli Desideria Hernández-Mancillas, **Evelia Lorena Coss Navarrete**, Miguel Ángel Mazorra-Manzano, Idalia Osuna-Ruiz, Víctor Alfonso Rodríguez-Tirado, Jesús Aarón Salazar-Leyva \| DOI: [10.1007/s12010-016-2319-x](#0) \| PMID: 27830465 **2017** \| **Journal Article** \| CARACTERIZACION PARCIAL DE LA ACTIVIDAD COAGULANTE Y CASEINOLITICA DE LAS PROTEASAS DEL FRUTO DE AGUAMA (Bromelia pinguin L.) \| Moreno-Henandez, J. M., Hernandez-Mancillas, X. D., **Coss Navarrete, E. L.,** Banuelos-Perez, M. de J., Salazar-Leyva, J. A., Osuna-Ruiz, I., Rodriguez-Tirado, V. A., & Mazorra-Manzano, M. Angel \| DOI: - Both articles derived from my undergraduate summer research stay within the **Proyecto Delfín** program. I carried out activity **zymograms** to classify proteolytic enzymes according to their activity under basic or acidic pH conditions. ## Preprints **2026** \| *Gene expression profiling of dendritic cell tolerance dysfunction in women with Systemic lupus erythematosus.* **Authors:** Ana Laura Hernández-Ledesm**a, Evelia Lorena Coss-Navarrete**, *et al*. \| **bioRxiv DOI:** . - **Abstract:** Systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE) involves profound immune tolerance defects. In this study, we profiled dendritic cells from women with SLE and healthy donors, revealing interferon‑stimulated gene dominance, impaired IL‑10 signaling, and altered lipid metabolism. These findings highlight converging mechanisms that compromise dendritic cell tolerogenic capacity and contribute to disease pathogenesis. - In this study, I contributed to transcriptomic data analysis, statistical reporting, and figure design, integrating biological interpretation of dendritic cell dysfunction in systemic lupus erythematosus. - **Data set:** Regulatory Network Analysis of SLE-Associated Regulon Activity using SCENIC pipeline. Zenodo. - **Data set:** Analysis of gene expression profiles during tolerance induction in dendritic cells from women with Systemic Lupus Erythematosus. Zenodo. - **GitHub:** [SLE Transcriptomic analysis tolerogenic](https://github.com/NeuroGenomicsMX/SLE_Transcriptomic_analysis_tolerogenic) **Pending** \| Differential gene expression in Peripheral Blood Mononuclear Cells from individuals with Systemic Lupus Erythematosus\| Sofía Guadalupe Salazar-Magaña, Ana Laura Hernández-Ledesma, **Evelia Lorena Coss-Navarrete**, Florencia Rosetti, Deshiré Alpízar-Rodríguez, Alejandra Medina-Rivera **Pending** \| Transcriptional heterogeneity of human peripheral blood neutrophils: a meta-analysis \| Saul Karr-de-León, **Evelia Lorena Coss-Navarrete**, Jorge Andrés Cázares-Preciado, Emmanuel Martínez-Ledesma, Alejandra Medina-Rivera and Marion E.G. Brunck **Pending** \| Análisis de la menarca en mujeres mexicanas (lupus, jaguar, twins, parkinson) **Pending** \| Shiny app de lupus - **GitHub:** [LupusRGMX_ShinyApp](https://github.com/NeuroGenomicsMX/LupusRGMX_ShinyApp/tree/main) ## Collaborations and Acknowledgments in Publications Acknowledged in the following publications for support and collaboration: - [An educator framework for organizing Wikipedia editathons for computational biology](https://academic.oup.com/bioinformatics/article/41/Supplement_1/i12/8199389)**-** *Bioinformatics* (2025, Supplement 1, i12). Acknowledged for contributions to the project. - [Enhancing antioxidant and antimutagenic activity of the green seaweed *Rhizoclonium riparium* by bioassay-guided solvent partitioning](https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s10811-019-01886-7) **-** *Journal of Applied Phycology* (2019). Mentioned in acknowledgments for technical collaboration. - [Antioxidant, antimutagenic and antiproliferative activities in selected seaweed species from Sinaloa, Mexico](https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.3109/13880209.2016.1150305) **-** *Pharmaceutical Biology* (2016). Recognized in acknowledgments for research support.
